Home_Screen_Info:
Bippy is a multipurpose tool for securing Crypto Currencies with a range of encryption methods.
Bippy can encrypt and decrypt private keys using the methodology outlined in the BIP38 (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal 38) specification.
No_Chosen_Currency:
No Currency has been selected
Please choose a currency form the drop down on the top bar.
Bip_Successful:
BIP0038 encryption was successful.

Your encrypted private key and address are below.
Bip_Decrypt_Successful:
BIP0038 Decryption was successful.

Your decrypted, WIF format private key and address are below.
Bip_Decrypt_Unsuccessful:
BIP0038 Decryption was unsuccessful.

Please try again to ensure you used the correct passphrase.
Address_Encryption_Successful:
BIP0038 style encryption of your Address was successful.

Your encrypted Address is below.
Address_Decryption_Successful:
BIP0038 style decryption of your encrypted Address was successful.

Your decrypted Address is below.
Electrum_Encrypt_Successful:
BIP0038 style encryption was successful.

Your encrypted Electrum Seed is below.
Electrum_Decrypt_Successful:
The decryption of your Electrum Seed was successful.

Your decrypted seed is below.
Starting_Bip:
Starting BIP0038 Encryption.

The interface may become unresponsive for ~10 seconds.
Starting_Decryption:
Starting Decryption

The interface may become unresponsive for ~10 seconds.
Home_Screen_Intro_Text:
Bippy

To get started, use the 'Action' switcher on the top bar to choose what you want to do.

For a more detailed explanation on any of the functions, hit the 'Info' button on the top bar.
New_Key_Intro_Text:
This action will generate a new private key and address for you if you don't already have one.

The Private key will be BIP0038 encrypted using the passphrase you enter below.

The passphrase must be a minimum of 7 characters long
Entropy_Explanation:
To ensure that a strong private key is generated you need to enter some randomness

Hold down your mouse button and draw dots on bippy.
Enough_Entropy:
You have generated enough Randomness.

Hit the 'Encrypt' button to start the BIP0038 encryption.
Existing_Key_Intro_Text:
This action will BIP0038 encrypt any existing private key you have.
It can also decrypt a BIP0038 encrypted key.
Acceptable private key formats are:
BIP0038, Compressed WIF, Uncompressed WIF, HEX, Base64 and Base6.

Enter the private key below to begin.
Compressed_Wif_Key_Entered: You entered a Compressed WIF Format private key
Uncompressed_Wif_Key_Entered: You entered an Uncompressed WIF Format private key
Hex_Key_Entered: You entered a HEX Format private key
Base64_Key_Entered: You entered a Base 64 Format private key
Base6_Key_Entered: You entered a Base 6 Format private key
Wif_Bad_Checksum:
The checksum doesn't match the WIF key you entered.

Please try again to ensure that you enter it correctly.
Bip_Bad_Checksum:
The checksum doesn't match the BIP0038 encrypted key you entered.

Please try again to ensure that you enter it correctly.
Not_Private_Key:
The text you entered was not recognised as a valid private key.

Please try again.
Bip_Key_Entered:
You entered a BIP0038 encrypted private key.

Please enter your encryption passphrase below to decrypt the key.
Mnemonic_Intro_Text:
This action will encrypt or decrypt a mnemonic seed.

Bippy uses a customised encryption method based on BIP0038.

Enter your seed or encrypted string to begin.
Invalid_Word_Electrum_Seed:
The seed you entered contains an invalid word not found in the Electrum dictionary.

Please double check your seed and try again.
Not_Mnemonic_Seed:
The text you entered was not recognised as a valid Mnemonic Seed.

Please try again.
Valid_Electrum_Seed:
You entered a valid Electrum seed.

Please enter a passphrase below to encrypt the seed.
Valid_Encrypted_Electrum_Seed:
You entered a valid encrypted Electrum seed.

Please enter your encryption passphrase below to decrypt the seed.
Encrypted_Electrum_Bad_Checksum:
The checksum doesn't match the encrypted Electrum seed you entered.

Please try again to ensure that you enter it correctly.
Electrum_Bad_Salt:
The calculated seed doesn't match the hash contained in the encrypted seed.
Please try again to ensure you enter it correctly.
Public_Key_Intro_Text: This action will encrypt any public address using a custom, BIP0038 style encryption method.
Not_Valid_Address: The address entered was not a valid
Address_Bad_Checksum:
The checksum doesn't match the address you entered.

Please try again to ensure that you enter it correctly.
Encrypted_Address_Bad_Checksum:
The checksum doesn't match the encrypted address you entered.

Please try again to ensure that you enter it correctly.
Encrypted_Address_No_Match:
The calculated plain address doesn't match the hash stored in the encrypted address.
Please try again to ensure you enter it correctly.
No_Valid_Address:
The text you entered wasn't a valid Address or encrypted address.
Please try again.
Valid_Public_Address_2: Please enter your passphrase below to encrypt it.
Valid_Encrypted_Address:
You entered a valid encrypted public address.

Please enter your passphrase below to decrypt it.
